sentences.sContent: The House of Lords overruled the decision of the Court of Appeal.
sentences.sCn: 上议院推翻了上诉法院的判决。

sentences.sContent: They have the power to overrule the local council.
sentences.sCn: 他们有权否决地方议会的决定。

remMethod.val: over(在…上) + rule(统治) → 凌驾于他人之上 → 驳回， 否决

trans.tranOther: to change an order or decision that you think is wrong, using your official power
